text: Audrey Mary Totter (December 20, 1917 â€“ December 12, 2013) was an American actress. She worked for Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer as a contract star. Totter was known for her role on Medical Center. Totter died of a stroke in Los Angeles, California on December 12, 2013, aged 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1917 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Illinois
